name: phcode-api-cf-worker
description: PH Code API running on Cloudflare Workers

scripts.predeploy: node -e "const fse = require('fs-extra'); if(fse.existsSync('./dist')) fse.removeSync('./dist'); fse.mkdirSync('./dist', { recursive: true }); fse.copySync('./static', './dist/static'); fse.copySync('./templates/index.html', './dist/index.html'); fse.copySync('./templates/easyrun.html', './dist/easyrun.html');"

author: PH Code
